channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The HDD brand that brought you the 1.8-inch, 2.5-inch, and 3.5-inch hard drives is now back with a $19 pocket-sized personal cloud for your smartphones - just make sure you don't lose it
item.description: Conner introduces Pocket Cloud, a tiny device enabling phone backups, fast charging, 4K recording, expandable microSD storage, and multi-device compatibility.

item.title: Get up to 81 percent off ExpressVPN two-year plans
item.description:
ExpressVPN is back on sale again, and its two-year plans are up to 81 percent off right now. You can get the Advanced tier for $88 for 28 months. This is marked down from the $392 that this time frame normally costs. On a per-month basis, it works out to roughly $3.14 for the promo period. We’ve consistently liked ExpressVPN because it’s fast, easy to use and widely available across a large global server network. In fact, it's our current pick for best premium VPN. One of the biggest drawbacks has always been its high cost, and this deal temporarily solves that issue.
In our review we were ...

item.title: 'Satisfying and great-tasting results' — this five-star De'Longhi coffee maker is a spectacular value, and it's $200 off at Best Buy
item.description: The De'Longhi La Specialista Arte Evo earned full marks in our 2024 review, and it's still an exceptional buy for beginner baristas.

item.title: Google reporte l’arrivée de la première bêta d’Android 17
item.description: Google accélère la cadence. La firme de Mountain View vient d'officialiser le lancement très prochain de la première bêta d'Android 17. Une excellente nouvelle qui cache toutefois une petite subtilité technique pour les testeurs actuels.

item.title: The Success of ‘Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Is Boosting Its Comic Adaptations
item.description: Graphic novel versions of the 'Dunk and Egg' stories have risen up in the ranks thanks to HBO's latest 'Game of Thrones' spin-off.

item.title: Segway Navimow CEO on why it won't be 'simply piling on features' in its robot lawn mowers
item.description: Exclusive: 'I have always hoped that technology can truly be applied to people's daily needs.'

item.title: IKEA just released the smart sensor range I've been waiting for – simple, helpful gadgets from as little as $6
item.description: Take a look at my favorite picks from IKEA's new Matter-compatible smart sensor lineup.

item.title: Watch out, Tesla – the early Rivian R2 verdicts suggest it's going to be a serious Model Y rival
item.description: World's top media get an early drive with Rivian's R2 and early reports suggest the company is on to a winner

item.title: How to cancel Mullvad VPN
item.description: This is going to be one of the shortest articles in my series on how to cancel your subscriptions to the best VPNs. Unlike most providers, Mullvad VPN does not automatically renew an expired subscription unless you tell it to. Thanks to its unique pricing approach, cancelling Mullvad is the default option.When you sign up for Mullvad, you pay for as many months upfront as you want at the constant rate of 5 Euro per month (varying with exchange rates). Each month, Mullvad takes 5 Euro out of your account until there's nothing left. If you're no longer satisfied with Mullvad, all you have to do ...

item.title: How to get into a16z’s super-competitive Speedrun startup accelerator program
item.description: TechCrunch spoke to a16z partner Joshua Lu for some tips on standing out for the Speedrun program.

item.title: Une base sur la Lune avant Mars ? Ce que révèle le nouveau virage stratégique de Musk
item.description: Mais pourquoi n’y a-t-il pas pensé plus tôt ? Au lieu de partir vers Mars, Elon Musk parle beaucoup d'implanter une base permanente sur la Lune. Futura s’est mis dans la tête de Musk pour comprendre les motivations de son projet lunaire.

item.title: Cash App adds payment links so you can get paid in a DM
item.description: The new feature allows users to share payment requests in a variety of digital settings.

item.title: Bad Bunny streams jumped 175% in the U.S. after the Super Bowl
item.description: Apple Music found that Bad Bunny’s show playlist became its most-played set list shortly after the performance. The legacy of Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl halftime show continues. Streams of his catalog jumped 175% in the U.S. on Monday, the day after the Super Bowl, when compared to the previous Monday, Feb. 2.

item.title: Anthropic beefs up Claude's free tier as OpenAI prepares to stuff ads into ChatGPT's
item.description: Anthropic is upgrading Claude's free tier, apparently to capitalize on OpenAI's planned integration of ads into ChatGPT. On Wednesday, Anthropic said free Claude users can now create files, connect to external services, use skills and more.Anthropic added the ability for paid users to create files in September. Starting today, free users of the chatbot can also create and edit Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Word docs and PDFs. Claude's file creation abilities are powered by Sonnet 4.5.Free users can now create and edit Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Word docs, and...

item.title: Apple just released iOS 26.3 alongside updates for the Mac, iPad and Apple Watch
item.description: Apple has released the software update 26.3 for its various platforms. This includes the iPhone, iPad, Mac and Apple Watch. In other words, don't be surprised when your iPhone notifies you of a pending update. Unfortunately, there isn't all that much to talk about here. Consider this a minor update that focuses primarily on bug fixes, which is important but not exactly fun. It is worth noting that the new iOS and iPadOS has an especially long list of fixes. There are 37 security issues addressed by the update, according to a report by 9to5Mac. iOS 26.3 and iPadOS 26.3 do include a new tool fo...

item.title: The ICE Expansion Won't Happen in the Dark
item.description: People have a right to know who their neighbors are, especially when it's ICE.

item.title: Amazon’s new eero Signal keeps you connected to the internet when outages occur
item.description: A new device from eero will keep you online even if your ISP goes down.

item.title: The search is on: 2026 Joseph C. Belden Innovation Award nominations are open
item.description: Nominations for the 2026 Joseph C. Belden Innovation Award are open, inviting SMBs with groundbreaking innovation a chance to win scaling opportunities. Last day to apply is February 13.

item.title: Amazon's same-day prescription deliveries are coming to even more cities
item.description: Amazon has announced that it will bring its same-day prescription delivery service to 4,500 new cities and towns by the end of 2026. The company originally launched Amazon Pharmacy in 2020 with a two-day delivery option, and has continued to increase the availability and delivery speed of the service in the years that followed, including expanding access to nearly half of all US residents in 2024.The company's announcement doesn't break down all the new cities same-day deliveries will be available in, but does note that the delivery option is coming to Idaho and Massachusetts for the first tim...

item.title: Activist investor Ancora publicly opposes the WBD-Netflix deal
item.description: An investment group is trying to sway Netflix shareholders to reject the WBD deal in favor of Paramount.

item.title: 'A resounding home run' - the Nothing Ear (a) earbuds are some of the best we've tested and they even converted me from being an in-ear headphones skeptic
item.description: The Nothing Ear (a) are the earbuds that brought me back to the world of in-ear headphones - and they're not even pricey.

item.title: How to watch Sweden vs. Italy in mens ice hockey online for free
item.description: How to watch ice hockey for free. Live stream Sweden vs. Italy in men's ice hockey for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: IoT Is Changing Agriculture. But the Reality of the Cyber-Farm is Still Messy - SciLogs
item.description: Some 10,000 years ago, Neolithic cultures started transitioning from a hunter-gatherer lifestyle to a more sedentary, farming lifestyle.

item.description: 'Passionate' is certainly a word to describe the discourse about the HBO show's second season.

item.title: I Loved My OpenClaw AI Agent—Until It Turned on Me
item.description: I used the viral AI helper to order groceries, sort emails, and negotiate deals. Then it decided to scam me.

item.title: What even is a ‘low-hire, low-fire’ environment?
item.description: And why it matters (or may not) in 2026. 2025 was defined by reports of a “low-hire, low-fire” environment: The unemployment rate remained fairly low, at just over 4% in December, yet headlines of constant layoffs seemed to dominate the news cycle, and those who are unemployed are taking longer to find work.

item.title: Keke Palmer and The Burbs co-stars and creator weigh in on taboo shows and tinned fish
item.description: "The 'Burbs" stars Keke Palmer, Julia Duffy, and Kapil Talwalkar and creator Celeste Hughey discuss sardines, and the first bit of media they had to sneak past their parents.

item.title: CBO predicts federal deficits and debt to worsen over next decade amid Trump’s policies
item.description: The projected 2026 deficit is about $100 billion higher, and total deficits from 2026 to 2035 are $1.4 trillion larger. The nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office’s 10-year outlook projects worsening long-term federal deficits and rising debt, driven largely by increased spending, notably on Social Security, Medicare, and debt service payments.

item.description: Will its customer base follow?

item.title: Amazon Pharmacy’s latest move could change how you get prescriptions filled
item.description: The company plans to expand same-day prescription delivery to nearly 4,500 cities and towns by the end of 2026. Amazon is expanding its same-day delivery services for its Pharmacy. In an announcement Wednesday the company said plans to bring Amazon Pharmacy to nearly 4,500 locations around the country, which is an addition of around 2,000 cities and towns by the end of 2026. ...

item.title: Moderna Has a Promising New Flu mRNA Vaccine. Trump’s FDA Wants Nothing to Do With It
item.description: Senior FDA official Vinay Prasad reportedly overrode his staff in deciding to reject Moderna's application for a new seasonal flu shot.
